extensionDescription.message: Open and browse any link in a Thunderbird content tab. Links are followed within the tab and back/forward navigation is supported. Also with enhanced Zoom customization and a url bar.

reloadCurrentPageOrMessage.description: $1 is the keyboard shortcut for reload.

stopLoadingCurrentPageOrMessage.message: Stop loading this page or message (Esc)

urlbar-go-button.message: Go to the address in the Location Bar

certImminentDistrust.message.message: The security certificate in use on this website will no longer be trusted in a future release. For more information, visit https://wiki.mozilla.org/CA/Upcoming_Distrust_Actions

identity.identified.verified_by_you.message: You have added a security exception for this site.

urlbarZoomButtonTooltip.description: $1 is the keyboard shortcut for resetting the zoom level to 100%.

tabsLoadInBackground.message: Open a message or link in a background tab (new tab is not focused)

tabsLoadInBackgroundExtra.message: * Shift-select the context menuitem to reverse this setting.

linkClickLoadsInTab.message: Link click opens in a new tab instead of an external browser

linkClickLoadsInTabExtra.message: * Ctrl-click the link to reverse this setting.

linkClickLoadsInBackgroundTab.message: Link click opens in a new background tab

linkClickLoadsInBackgroundTabExtra.message: * Shift-click the link to reverse this setting.

forceLinkClickLoadsInCurrentTab.message: Force link click or open in the current content tab to load in the same tab

forceLinkClickLoadsInCurrentTabExtra.message: * Ctrl-click the link to reverse this setting.

showContentBase.message: Include content-base header link in compose forward inline messages

contentBaseLabel.description: Options. Compose forward inline header name for content-base url.

contentBaseHeader.description: Options. Default header name for content-base url.

useFirefoxCompatUserAgent.message: Set the user agent to Firefox Compatibility when opening links only

useFirefoxCompatUserAgentExtra.message: * Check pref 'general.useragent.compatMode.firefox' for the default global setting.

systemContentTabOrLinkNote.message: Note: These preferences apply to links in many system content tabs such as Add-ons Manager or other about: pages. Links in Preferences/Options or links in other chrome locations are currently not affected and will open in a tab or external browser as defined by internal code.

globalZoomFactor.message: Global chrome and content zoom level:

globalZoomFactorExtra.message: * Setting for chrome font size and UI elements (folder list, message list, toolbars, tabs, icons) as well as content (messages, web pages, about system pages). Change is applied to content in a tab upon tab selection.

zoomIncrementExtra.message: * Additional factor for content, applied to the global setting above, using Ctrl+/- or Ctrl-mousewheel up/down or left mousebutton down-mousewheel up/down. Zoom level is shown in the url toolbar.

perTabZoomDisabledExtra.message: * Use current tab zoom level for all tabs, instead of per tab zoom setting.

imageZoomEnabledExtra.message: * Zoom image under the cursor only. Use Ctrl-left mouse button click to reset -- this restores native click to toggle shrink-to-fit if the image is overflowing.

mousebuttonZoomEnabled.message: Enable left mousebutton down-mousewheel up/down zoom

mousebuttonZoomImageOnlyEnabled.message: Only on images, if image zoom is enabled
